startedAtTime._instruction: Enter the time (e.g., '20:20:39+00:00') or datetime (e.g., '2018-11-13T20:20:39+00:00') of when the activity started.

endedAtTime._instruction: Enter the time (e.g., '20:20:39+00:00') or datetime (e.g., '2018-11-13T20:20:39+00:00') of when the activity ended.

coordinatePoint._instruction: Add the central coordinate of this electrode contact.

definedIn._instruction: Add one or several files in which the electrode contact is defined in.

relatedStimulation._instruction: Add one or several files in which the stimulations applied via this electrode contact were stored.

relatedRecording._instruction: Add one or several files in which the recordings from this electrode contact were stored.

contactResistance._instruction: Enter the contact resistance of this electrode.
